DOC.brief_summary: This study validate Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) tool mainland Chinese patient osteoarthritis knee . This study also evaluate effect Mobic versus placebo reduce symptom osteoarthritis population .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Meloxicam Versus Placebo In Mainland Chinese Patients With Osteoarthritis Of The Knee
DOC.detailed_description: To validate culturally WOMAC tool mainland China observe different response meloxicam placebo patient population osteoarthritis knee

Diagnosed treated esophageal , gastric , pyloric channel , duodenal ulceration within 30 day prior receive first dose study medication .
